EmailTemplate.name: Order Expedite Request Initial Follow-up Communication
EmailTemplate.subject: Order Expedite Request {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Purchase Order Number: <Enter customer PO Number>
Sales Order Number: <Enter sales order number>
We have contacted our planning organization and they are actively working to support your expedite request.
We will provide a response in 3 business days.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
